name: YouVersionRest
0:
”Alexa, play YouVersion Rest”
”Alexa, open YouVersion Rest”
”Alexa, ask YouVersion Rest to change my background”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: youversion rest
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Relax with YouVersion Rest: a new way to meditate on Scripture. Meditate or go to sleep while listening to a calming voice read the Bible to you. This new skill includes a male and a female voice, along with four soothing background sounds: rain, thunderstorm, ocean and soft piano. By default, YouVersion Rest will play for 30 minutes. If you want YouVersion Rest to keep playing, simply say “loop” while listening.

If you want to change the background, simply say "Alexa, ask YouVersion Rest to change my background," at any time.

To change to a different voice, say "Alexa, ask YouVersion Rest to change the voice."


Brought to you by the creators of YouVersion Bible.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
